title: Probe
description: Defines the location and description of a probe. Upon execution ( HTTP GET ) defines the state of the probe.

self.description: system function identifying a unique system owned resource as a URL

code.description: machine facing value that uniquely identifies the probe

description.description: human readable string describing the probe's purpose

httpStatusCode.description: usually used bottom probe but may also be returned by api or application specific probes

value.description: details from the probe that may help users understand the health of an endpoint

when.description: date and time of probe execution
